attributes.action: SIGN if you think MP who wont reimburse the state or have tried to profit from benefits should be made to resign
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the MPs have gotten off quite lightly, but they should be made to suffer what the average person would if they were caught claiming even a small amount

rejection.details: MPs' expenses are a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
